gnutellaClient

Class PingMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • gnutellaClient.Message
      • gnutellaClient.PingMessage

  • public class PingMessage
extends Message
    Class that defines a PingMessage defined in Gnutella Protocol v0.4
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ismael Fernandez, Miguel Vilchis

    • Constructor Detail

      • PingMessage

        public PingMessage(byte[] idMessage,
           byte ttl,
           byte hop,
           java.net.InetSocketAddress receptorNode)
        Creates a PingMessage with the specified idMessage, ttl, hop, receptor node
        Parameters:
        idMessage - A 16-byte string uniquely identifying the descriptor on the network
        ttl - Time to live. The number of times the descriptor will be forwarded by Gnutella servents before it is removed from the network
        hop - The number of times the descriptor has been forwarded
        receptorNode - Id of the thread that received the message

      • PingMessage

        public PingMessage(byte ttl,
           byte hop,
           java.net.InetSocketAddress receptorNode)
        Creates a PingMessage with the specified ttl, hop, receptor node. The idMessage is generated random.
        Parameters:
        ttl - Time to live. The number of times the descriptor will be forwarded by Gnutella servents before it is removed from the network
        hop - The number of times the descriptor has been forwarded
        receptorNode - Id of the thread that received the message
